# StandardErc721.getOwnedTokenIds() method

Get Owned Token Ids

**Signature:**

```typescript
getOwnedTokenIds(walletAddress?: AddressOrEns): Promise<BigNumber[]>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter     | Type                                  | Description  |
| ------------- | ------------------------------------- | ------------ |
| walletAddress | [AddressOrEns](./sdk.addressorens.md) | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;BigNumber\[\]&gt;

## Remarks

Get all the token ids of NFTs owned by a specific wallet (no metadata)
